events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for it as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on customer's request for money back due to receiving the wrong product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong item and I am here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed?
Here is my order number 564738 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. I will send the item back using the return label once I receive it.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and that the return process is going smoothly. Let us know if we can help.
Since there has been no further contact, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience and please reach out for any future issues.
